product_description: Product Description Keep babys bed naturally comfortable and well protected from leaky messes with the Sealy Quilted Crib/Toddler Mattress Pad with Organic Cotton Top. Premium quilted filling provides added comfort for both infants and toddlers and is made from easy-clean plush polyester for durability. A 100% PVC-free waterproof barrier, made from safety-tested TPU coated polyester, makes clean-ups a breeze. For a snug fit, the deep pocked SecureStay fitted skirt easily stretches to wrap underneath both crib and toddler bed mattresses to help prevent sliding, shifting and bunching. We recommend that new parents purchase 2-4 crib mattress pads, so you always have a fresh, dry pad on-hand while the others are in the wash. From the Manufacturer Sealy Baby offers the most trusted crib mattresses and offers safe, supportive, and comfortable toddler bed mattresses, bedside baby bassinets and protective premium crib bedding that parents have depended on for decades. Sealy Baby crib mattresses are firmness tested to help reduce the risk of suffocation and provide a supportive sleeping surface. In addition, 100% of Sealy Baby crib mattresses are American made by experts who help create industry standards to ensure safety and quality for infants and toddlers.
